languages.text: If {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Round Defence{/g} ability used by the wearer was not triggered, they start the next turn with +{uip|MP|f95c1ab898254bdab259712ba8cf941f} MP.

traits.locale_text: If {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Stalwart Defense{/g} ability used by the wearer was not triggered, they start the next turn with +{uip|MP|f95c1ab898254bdab259712ba8cf941f} MP.

languages.text: If the wearer uses {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Stalwart Defence{/g}, but its effect is not triggered by the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their next turn.
languages.original_text: Если персонаж использовал {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Стойкую оборону{/g}, но ее эффект не был активирован в течение раунда, персонаж получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в своем следующем {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer uses {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Stalwart Defence{/g}, but its effect is not triggered by the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their next turn.

If the wearer uses {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Stalwart Defence{/g}, but its effect is not triggered by the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their next turn.

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Kaya Gibi Savunma{/g} kabiliyeti kullanırsa ama etkisi bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında tetiklenmezse bir sonraki turu için +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: If the wearer uses {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Stalwart Defence{/g}, but its effect is not triggered by the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişi, {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Kaya Gibi Savunma{/g} kabiliyeti kullanırsa ama etkisi bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında tetiklenmezse bir sonraki turu için +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır.

Takan kişi, {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Dört Yandan Savunma{/g} kabiliyeti kullanırsa ama etkisi bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında tetiklenmezse bir sonraki turu için +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} HP kazanır.

languages.text: Si el portador utiliza {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Defensa de inexpugnable{/g} pero no se activa su efecto antes de que empiece su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, obtiene +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} durante su próximo turno.
languages.original_text: If the wearer uses {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Stalwart Defence{/g}, but its effect is not triggered by the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador utiliza {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Defensa de inexpugnable{/g} pero no se activa su efecto antes de que empiece su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, obtiene +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} durante su próximo turno.

languages.text: 如果装备者使用了{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}坚定防御{/g}，但直到下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时都没有触发此能力的效果，则下个回合额外获得{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: If the wearer uses {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Stalwart Defence{/g}, but its effect is not triggered by the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their next turn.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者使用了{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}坚定防御{/g}，但直到下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时都没有触发此能力的效果，则下个回合额外获得{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
如果装备者使用了{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}全面防御{/g}，但直到下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时都没有触发此能力的效果，则下个回合额外获得{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点移动点数。

languages.text: Wenn der Träger {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Standfeste Verteidigung{/g} einsetzt, der Effekt aber nicht bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} ausgelöst wird, erhält er bis zu seinem nächsten Zug +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer uses {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Stalwart Defence{/g}, but its effect is not triggered by the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Standfeste Verteidigung{/g} einsetzt, der Effekt aber nicht bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} ausgelöst wird, erhält er bis zu seinem nächsten Zug +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.

languages.text: Si le porteur utilise {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Défense inébranlable{/g}, mais que son effet ne se déclenche pas au début de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il gagne +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} lors de son prochain tour.
languages.original_text: If the wearer uses {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Stalwart Defence{/g}, but its effect is not triggered by the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Si le porteur utilise {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Défense inébranlable{/g}, mais que son effet ne se déclenche pas au début de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il gagne +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} lors de son prochain tour.

Si le porteur utilise {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Omnidéfense{/g}, mais que son effet ne se déclenche pas au début de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il gagne +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} lors de son prochain tour.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}鉄壁の防御{/g}を使用しているが、その効果が次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始まで発動しない場合、次のターンの間{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}される。
languages.original_text: If the wearer uses {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Stalwart Defence{/g}, but its effect is not triggered by the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their next turn.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}オールラウンドディフェンス{/g}を使用しているが、その効果が次のターンの開始まで発動しない場合、次のターンの間MPが+{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}される。
使用者が{g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}オールラウンドディフェンス{/g}を使用しているが、その効果が次のターンの開始まで発動しない場合、次のターンの間MPが+{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}される。

languages.text: Если персонаж использовал {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Стойкую оборону{/g}, но ее эффект не был активирован в течение раунда, персонаж получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в своем следующем {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer uses {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Stalwart Defence{/g}, but its effect is not triggered by the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Если персонаж использовал {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Стойкую оборону{/g}, но ее эффект не был активирован в течение раунда, персонаж получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} ОП в своем следующем ходу.

Если персонаж использовал {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Стойкую оборону{/g}, но ее эффект не был активирован в течение раунда, персонаж получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} ОП в своем следующем ходу.
